content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/process-header-bg.jpg” custom_padding=”120px||120px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ custom_css_main_element=”background-position: 50% 42%;” global_colors_info=”{}” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(9,19,30,0.85)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Process

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width_tablet=”500px” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|tablet” module_alignment_tablet=”center” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our 7 Step Wealth Management Process

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Holistic wealth planning involves more than just portfolio discussions. The 7 Step Wealth Management Process takes a holistic approach to wealth planning. Through a written customized wealth management plan our team addresses the various areas of wealth planning including tax minimization planning, estate planning (as it relates to investments), retirement income planning, philanthropy, business succession, portfolio construction and management. The process takes clients through 5 initial meetings with our team, followed by a meeting with a tax lawyer and/or Notary. Once the plan has been implemented, a structured review program is put in place that includes regular wealth planning and portfolio assessments.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

1. Discovery Meeting

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Gathering client data; explain services provided; in-depth goal setting & lifestyle planning; outline of financial management program.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

2. Discussion Paper

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Examine scenario analysis; develop appropriate strategies to address issues and opportunities; review needs and objectives; compare current vs. recommended strategies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

3. Planning Presentation

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Present and review the Wealth Plan with client; identify projections, tactics, and considerations.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

4. Investment Planning

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Establish an IPS (Investment Policy Statement); comprehensive investment analysis; Strategical and Tactical Asset Allocation Plan.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

5. Insurance & Estate Planning

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Implement risk management and estate plan; Identification of specific risks and planning opportunities.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

6. Legal Work

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Review and update wills and powers of attorney; discuss and establish trusts.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” max_width=”900px” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”45px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_text_color=”#000000″ header_2_font_size=”26px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

7. Final Review

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”2px” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” width=”200px” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Ongoing monitoring of plan; review progress; changes in personal circumstances; changing tax laws and economic circumstances.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#09131E” background_image=”https://rosengroup.ca/wp-content/uploads/2022/03/cta-footer-background-paralax_2.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px||false|false” global_module=”868″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” module_class=”align-center” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_typing_effect before_typing_effect=”Invest in” typing_effect=”yourself.|your future.” typing_speed=”50ms” typing_backdelay=”3000ms” typing_cursor=”| ” _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|tablet” header_font_size_tablet=”48px” header_font_size_phone=”34px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_typing_effect][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _module_preset=”45bda54e-96c3-41cf-a663-5af8a7714565″ header_2_font=”Raleway|300||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#AC9869″ header_2_letter_spacing=”2px” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”||||false|false” header_2_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_2_font_size_phone=”20px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Contact us today

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.10.5″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_button button_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjM4OCJ9fQ==@” button_text=”Get In Touch” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.10.8″ _dynamic_attributes=”button_url” _module_preset=”df9c7a6a-ffe3-4d5f-9c80-8d55d8fb5bf6″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

The 7 Step Wealth Management Process takes a holistic approach to wealth planning. Through a written customized wealth management plan our team addresses the various areas of wealth planning including tax minimization planning, estate planning (as it relates to investments), retirement income planning, philanthropy, business succession, portfolio construction and management. The process takes clients through 5 initial meetings with our team, followed by a meeting with a tax lawyer and/or Notary. Once the plan has been implemented, a structured review program is put in place that includes regular wealth planning and portfolio assessments.1. Discussion PaperExamine scenario analysis; develop appropriate strategies to address issues and opportunities; review needs and objectives; compare current vs. recommended strategies.3. Planning PresentationPresent and review the Wealth Plan with client; identify projections, tactics, and considerations.4.
